content.en: Imputation algorithms: Scientists have been exploring different algorithms to accurately estimate missing values in weather data. These algorithms use information from neighboring stations, comparison of different imputation methods, and assessment of various techniques including averaging and regression. They have also developed new algorithms based on regression methods, weighted methods of imputation, and machine learning approaches. These advancements in imputation algorithms are crucial for filling in missing data in climate databases and improving the accuracy of weather predictions.
content.da: Imputationsalgoritmer: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for nøjagtigt at estimere manglende værdier i vejrdata. Disse algoritmer bruger information fra nabostationer, sammenligning af forskellige imputeringsmetoder og vurdering af forskellige teknikker, herunder gennemsnit og regression. De har også udviklet nye algoritmer baseret på regressionsmetoder, vægtede imputeringsmetoder og maskinlæringstilgange. Disse fremskridt inden for imputationsalgoritmer er afgørende for at udfylde manglende data i klimadatabaser og forbedre nøjagtigheden af vejrprognoser.
